text.div:
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
WhoCrQuestionnaireCovid19SurveillanceQuestionnaire
instructionReport to WHO within 48 hours of case identification0..1display
report_dateDate of reporting to national health authority:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.report.date
report_countryReporting country:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.report.country
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
report_test_reasonWhy tested for COVID-19:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.report.testReason
Value Set: Reason for Covid-19 Testing
section_patient_infoSection 1. Patient information0..1group
patinfo_IDUnique Case Identifier (used in country):0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.caseId
patinfo_ageonsetAge (use days if <1 month, months if <1 year):0..1quantityDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.onsetAge
patinfo_sexSex at birth:0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.birthSex
Value Set: Patient Sex at birth
patinfo_placediagnosedPlace where the case was diagnosed:0..1group
patinfo_idadmin0Country:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.identified.admin0
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
patinfo_idadmin1Admin Level 1 (province):0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.identified.admin1
Enable When:
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 1 Names (Province/State/Canton)
patinfo_placeresideCase usual place of residency:0..1group
patinfo_resadmin0Country:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.patientInfo.residence.admin0
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
section_clinical_statusSection 2. Clinical Status0..1group
Lab_date1Date of first laboratory confirmation test:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.lab.confirmedDate
patcourse_asympAny symptoms or signs at time of specimen collection that resulted in first laboratory confirmation?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.asymptomatic
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patcourse_asymp_helpNo: Case was asymptomatic0..1display
patcourse_dateonsetDate of onset of symptoms:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.onsetDate
Enable When:
section_comorbidityUnderlying conditions and comorbidity:0..1group
Comcond_presentAny underlying conditions?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.present
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
section_comorb_listIf yes, select all that apply:0..1groupEnable When:
Comcond_pregPregnancy0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.pregnant
Comcond_pregtTrimester of pregnancy0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.pregnantTrimester
Enable When:
Value Set: Pregnancy Trimester
Comcond_partumPost-partum (< 6 weeks)0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.postpartum
Comcond_immunoImmunodeficiency including HIV0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.immunodeficiency
Comcond_cardiCardiovacsular disease including hypertension0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.cardiovacsular
Comcond_diabetesDiabetes0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.diabetes
Comcond_liverLiver disease0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.liver
Comcond_renalRenal disease0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.renal
Comcond_neuroChronic neurological or neuromuscular disease0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.neuro
Comcond_maligMalignancy0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.malignancy
Comcond_lungChronic lung disease0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.lung
Comcond_otherOther, please specify:0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.comorbidities.other
section_health_statusHealth Status at time of Reporting:0..1group
patcourse_admitAdmission to hospital:0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.wasAdmitted
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
section_hospital_admissionif yes:0..1groupDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.admitDate
Enable When:
patcourse_presHCFFirst date of admission to hospital:0..1date
patcourse_icuDid the case receive care in an intensive care unit (ICU)?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.receivedIcuCare
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patcourse_ventDid the case receive ventilation?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.ventilated
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patcourse_ecmoDid the case receive extracorporeal membrane oxygenation?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.receivedEcmo
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patcourse_isoIs case in isolation with Infection Control Practice in place?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.wasIsolated
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patcourse_dateisoDate of isolation:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.clinicalStatus.patientCourse.isolatedDate
Enable When:
section_exposure_riskSection 3. Exposure risk in the 14 days prior to symptom onset (prior to testing if asymptomatic)0..1group
patinfo_occuhcwIs case a Health Care Worker (any job in a health care setting):0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.patientInfo.hcw.isHealthcareWorker
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
patinfo_occuhcw_ifyesIf yes:0..1groupEnable When:
patinfo_occuhcw_hcf_infonull0..*groupDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.patientInfo.hcw.workFacility
patinfo_occuhcw_countryCountry:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.patientInfo.hcw.workFacility.country
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
patinfo_occuhcw_cityCity:0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.patientInfo.hcw.workFacility.city
patinfo_occuhcw_nameName of Facility:0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.patientInfo.hcw.workFacility.facilityName
expo_travelHas the case travelled in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.travel.hasTravelled
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
expo_travel_ifyesIf yes, please specify the places the patient travelled to and date of departure from the places:0..*groupEnable When:
expo_travel_countryCountry:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.travel.location.country
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
expo_travel_cityCity:0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.travel.location.city
expo_travel_dateDate of Departure from the place:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.visitedHealthcare
expo_visit_healthcareHas case visited any health care facility in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.visitedHealthcare
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
expo_contact_caseHas case had contact with a confirmed case in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.hadContact
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
expo_contactsIf yes, please list unique case identifiers of all probable or confirmed cases:0..*groupEnable When:
expo_IDContact ID0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.contact.identifier
expo_case_date_firstFirst Date of Contact0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.contact.exposureFirstDate
expo_case_date_lastLast Date of Contact0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.contact.exposureLastDate
expo_case_setting_detailContact setting:0..1stringDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.contact.setting
expo_case_locationMost likely country of exposure:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.exposure.contact.country
Value Set: List of Administrative Level 0 Names (Countries)
section_outcomeSection 4. Outcome0..1group
outcome_instructComplete and re-send the full form as soon as outcome of disease is known or after 30 days after initial report.0..1display
outcome_submitted_dateDate of re-submission of this report:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.submissionDate
outcome_asympIf case was asymptomatic at time of specimen collection resulting in first laboratory confirmation, did the case develop any symptoms or signs at any time prior to discharge or death?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.symptomatic
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
outcome_asymp_helpNo: the case remains asymptomatic; Yes: the previously asymptomatic case developed symptoms and/or signs of illness.0..1display
outcome_asymp_dateDate of onset of symptoms/signs of illness:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.symptomaticDate
Enable When:
section_clinical_courseClinical Course:0..1group
outcome_patcourse_admitAdmission to hospital (may have been previously reported):0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.wasAdmitted
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
outcome_patcourse_presHCFFirst date of admission to hospital:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.admitDate
Enable When:
section_outcome_admissionIf yes:0..1groupEnable When:
outcome_patcourse_icuDid the case receive care in an intensive care unit (ICU)?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.receivedIcuCare
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
outcome_patcourse_ventDid the case receive ventilation?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.ventilated
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
outcome_patcourse_ecmoDid the case receive extracorporeal membrane oxygenation?0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.receivedEcmo
Value Set: Yes/No/Unknown
outcome_patcourse_statusHealth Outcome:0..1open-choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.status
Value Set: Patient Outcome
outcome_date_of_outcomeDate of Release from isolation/hospital or Date of Death:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.patientCourse.statusDate
outcome_labIf released from hospital/isolation, details of last laboratory test0..1groupEnable When:
outcome_lab_dateDate of last test:0..1dateDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.lab.date
outcome_lab_resultResults of last test:0..1choiceDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.lab.result
Value Set: Test Result
outcome_contacts_followedTotal number of contacts followed for this case:0..1integerDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.contactsFollowed
outcome_contacts_followed_unknownUnknown:0..1booleanDefinition: WhoCrSurveillanceDataDictionary.outcome.contactsFollowedUnknown

Documentation for this format

item.text: Report to WHO within 48 hours of case identification
Date of reporting to national health authority:
Age (use days if <1 month, months if <1 year):
Place where the case was diagnosed:
Date of first laboratory confirmation test:
Any symptoms or signs at time of specimen collection that resulted in first laboratory confirmation?
If yes, select all that apply:
Health Status at time of Reporting:
First date of admission to hospital:
Did the case receive care in an intensive care unit (ICU)?
Did the case receive extracorporeal membrane oxygenation?
Is case in isolation with Infection Control Practice in place?
Exposure risk in the 14 days prior to symptom onset (prior to testing if asymptomatic)
Is case a Health Care Worker (any job in a health care setting):
Has the case travelled in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?
If yes, please specify the places the patient travelled to and date of departure from the places:
Date of Departure from the place:
Has case visited any health care facility in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?
Has case had contact with a confirmed case in the 14 days prior to symptom onset?
If yes, please list unique case identifiers of all probable or confirmed cases:
Complete and re-send the full form as soon as outcome of disease is known or after 30 days after initial report.
Date of re-submission of this report:
If case was asymptomatic at time of specimen collection resulting in first laboratory confirmation, did the case develop any symptoms or signs at any time prior to discharge or death?
No: the case remains asymptomatic; Yes: the previously asymptomatic case developed symptoms and/or signs of illness.
Date of onset of symptoms/signs of illness:
Admission to hospital (may have been previously reported):
First date of admission to hospital:
Did the case receive care in an intensive care unit (ICU)?
Did the case receive extracorporeal membrane oxygenation?
Date of Release from isolation/hospital or Date of Death:
If released from hospital/isolation, details of last laboratory test
Total number of contacts followed for this case:
